scenario_text.value:
There they are! Looks like they didn’t go too
far.
Hey, Shuuji! What’s going on?

Hm? Oh, Takuma. I feel like I should ask you
that. You seem concerned about something.

Me? No, I was just worried something was
wrong when I saw you head into the woods.

What? Oh! Us wandering off on our own must
have made you concerned.

It wasn’t Shuuji’s fault! I heard something
weird and he came with me to investigate.

Sorry to make you worry. I didn’t realize how
far we’d gone.

But you’ll probably tell me I shouldn’t be
going off on my own in the first place.
Oh, uh, well...

(Shuuji noticed something odd and followed up
right away. It’s good that he was decisive.)

(But he’s right. Acting independently without
telling anyone could lead to trouble.)
(What should I tell him?)
Thanks, Shuuji.
Say something first.
That was wrong.
Thanks, Shuuji.

There’s no need to apologize. You went to see
if there was something dangerous out there.

If anything, I feel like I should be thanking
you. So, thanks, Shuuji.

You mean it? I...I don’t know what to say
when you come out and thank me like that.

*ahem* Still, I shouldn’t have acted alone.
That I regret. I’ll tell someone next time.
Wow, Shuuji! That was so level-headed!

Haha, which is to say, my actions up until
now haven’t been very well thought out.
Yes, I still have a ways to go.
Say something first.

I can understand why you’d want to check that
out, and I appreciate it...

...but I wish you’d said something to us.
It’d be awful if anything happened to you.

Yeah... I’m sorry. I should’ve though things
out more carefully.

You’re right, Takuma. I’ll make sure to tell
someone next time.
That was wrong.

Yeah, you shouldn’t have acted on your own
like that.

We’re all friends here. It’s okay for you to
rely on us.
You’re right. I’m sorry.

I’ll make sure to tell someone next time.
Guess I still have a long way to go.

So that weird sound was coming from around
here?

Oh, yeah. It seemed like there was a lot of
rustling in the grass, so I was worried.

We’re still not sure if it’s an enemy or not,
so I won’t go too far. Don’t worry.

I’ll just check it out and come back. Plus,
with Lopmon to protect me, I’ll be fine.
Eheheh, that’s right, Shuuji.

Well, in that case, I’ll leave this to you
two. Just don’t do anything crazy, okay?
We won’t, don’t worry.

We didn’t turn up anything. Maybe Lopmon was
just imagining things.
